hero.title: Finance Scouts
hero.subtitle: Faculty of Economics & Business Administration
hero.description: Empowering students with financial knowledge and practical skills for a successful future in the world of finance.

workshops.title: Upcoming Workshops
workshops.subtitle: Enhance your skills with our expert-led sessions

about.title: About Us
about.subtitle: Learn more about our team and mission
about.description: The Finance Scouts is a dynamic student organization within the Faculty of Economics and Business Administration. We are dedicated to bridging the gap between academic knowledge and real-world financial practices.

affiliation.title: University Affiliation
affiliation.description: We operate under the guidance of the Faculty of Economics and Business Administration, collaborating with professors and industry professionals to deliver high-quality educational experiences.

whatWeDo.title: What We Do
items: Publish research papers and financial guides
Host networking events with industry professionals
Provide mentorship for aspiring finance students

items.title: Financial Literacy
items.description: Promote financial literacy among university students through accessible education and resources.

items.title: Practical Experience
items.description: Provide hands-on experience with real-world financial tools, analyses, and market simulations.

items.title: Professional Network
items.description: Build connections between students and finance industry professionals for career opportunities.

items.title: Research Excellence
items.description: Encourage and support student research in finance, economics, and business administration.

items.title: Community Impact
items.description: Extend our reach to the broader community through financial awareness programs.

items.title: Innovation
items.description: Stay at the forefront of fintech and modern financial practices.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.subtitle: Where we're heading
vision.statement: To be the leading student finance organization, shaping future financial leaders through education, innovation, and community engagement.
vision.mission: We empower students with comprehensive financial knowledge, practical skills, and professional networks. Through workshops, publications, and collaborative projects, we prepare the next generation of finance professionals to excel in a dynamic global economy.

items.title: Excellence
items.description: Striving for the highest standards in everything we do

items.title: Collaboration
items.description: Working together to achieve greater impact

research.name: Research & Publications
research.description: Leading research initiatives and publishing educational content

events.name: Events & Workshops
events.description: Planning and executing workshops, seminars, and networking events

marketing.name: Marketing & Communications
marketing.description: Managing social media, branding, and external communications

hr.name: Human Resources
hr.description: Recruitment, member development, and team culture

tech.name: Technology & Innovation
tech.description: Digital tools, website management, and fintech initiatives

items.title: Financial Literacy Workshop
items.description: Successfully hosted a workshop with 150+ attendees on personal finance management.

items.title: Investment Guide Publication
items.description: Published our first comprehensive guide for beginner investors.

items.title: Industry Partnership
items.description: Established partnership with leading financial institutions for student internships.

items.title: Stock Market Simulation
items.description: Organized a university-wide stock market simulation competition.

items.title: Beginner's Guide to Investing
items.description: A comprehensive introduction to investment fundamentals.

items.title: Financial Planning 101
items.description: Essential strategies for personal financial management.

items.title: Market Analysis Report
items.description: Quarterly analysis of market trends and opportunities.

items.title: Career in Finance
items.description: Pathways and opportunities in the finance industry.

news.description: We're excited to announce our new partnership with ABC Financial Services.

news.title: Member Applications Open
news.description: Applications for new team members are now open. Join us today!

join.title: Join Our Team
join.subtitle: Become part of something meaningful
join.description: We're always looking for passionate students to join our team. Whether you're interested in research, events, marketing, or technology, there's a place for you.

form.motivation: Why do you want to join?
form.motivationPlaceholder: Tell us about your interest in finance and what you hope to contribute to the team...

success.title: Application Submitted!
success.message: Thank you for your interest in joining our team. We will review your application and get back to you soon.

footer.description: Empowering students with financial knowledge and practical skills.
